Entries.DialogueText: I need to find some place to live... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need to find some to live...

Entries.DialogueText: But I have a plan... I'm going to rely on my friends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I have a plan... I'm going to rely on my friends.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, tastes just like golden walnuts! This is great!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, tastes just like golden walnuts! This is great!

Entries.DialogueText: I like this weather... it's so humid. It reminds me of the forest back home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like this weather... it's so humid. It reminds me of the forest back home.

Entries.DialogueText: It felt bad at first... to leave the island and set foot in a strange land. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It felt bad at first... to leave the island and set foot in a strange land.

Entries.DialogueText: But, I got used to it after a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, I got used to it after a while.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a very flexible person! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a very flexible person!

Entries.DialogueText: I felt like a stranger here, at first. But I've made a lot of friends! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I felt like a stranger here, at first. But I've made a lot of friends!

Entries.DialogueText: For once, I feel like I belong...
Entries.DisplayPattern: For once, I feel like I belong...

Entries.DialogueText: Miss Penny is doing her best to get me up to speed in my schooling. She's really nice...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Miss Penny is doing her best to get me up to speed in my schooling. She's really nice...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Luckily, I remember some things from my old, old life... before washing up on the island... so it's not as difficult as it could be.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Luckily, I remember some things from my old, old life... before washing up on the island... so it's not as difficult as it could be.

Entries.DialogueText: Miss Penny says she's impressed with how much I know!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Miss Penny says she's impressed with how much I know!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sure Jas and Vincent thought I was weird, at first. I accidentally squawked at the school table a few times... that didn't help. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sure Jas and Vincent thought I was weird, at first. I accidentally squawked at the school table a few s... that didn't help.

Entries.DialogueText: It was a big change for everyone. But we're good friends now! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was a big change for everyone. But we're good friends now!

Entries.DialogueText: When I first arrived, Linus made me a suit out of leaves, like his...
Entries.DisplayPattern: When I first arrived, Linus made me a suit out of leaves, like his...

Entries.DialogueText: But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango!

Entries.DialogueText: I think I'll stick to my feathers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I'll stick to my feathers.

Entries.DialogueText: Between Linus and Miss Penny, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Between Linus and Miss Penny, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!

Entries.DialogueText: Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you ever noticed all the interesting birds that live here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you ever noticed all the interesting birds that live here?

Entries.DialogueText: If you listen closely, they might tell you something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you listen closely, they might tell you something.

Entries.DialogueText: The birds of this valley don't mind the cold so much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The birds of this valley don't mind the cold so much.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a little jealous of their warm coats... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a little jealous of their warm coats...

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon!

Entries.DialogueText: I thought only birds could fly...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought only birds could fly...

Entries.DialogueText: Linus has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Linus has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here!

Entries.DialogueText: Though... I do kind of miss having golden walnuts for breakfast every morning... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though... I do kind of miss having golden walnuts for breakfast every morning...

Entries.DialogueText: Linus taught me how to make a special spice berry rubbed fish...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Linus taught me how to make a special spice berry rubbed fish...

Entries.DialogueText: He says if I eat enough of it it'll keep me warm this winter! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: He says if I eat enough of it it'll keep me warm this winter!

Entries.DialogueText: Uncle Linus says I should 'cook' my fish before eating it... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uncle Linus says I should 'cook' my fish before eating it...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm having a hard time getting used to it... so dry... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm having a hard getting used to it... so dry...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Nice to see you back on the island, just like old times. This is fun!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Nice to see you back on the island, just like old s. This is fun!

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I was scared when you first arrived... I knew my life was about to change. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I was scared when you first arrived... I knew my life was about to change.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, Stardew Valley might be my new home... but the island will always be my home, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, Stardew Valley might be my new home... but the island will always be my home, too.

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice to be able to come back and visit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice to be able to come back and visit.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe some day, I'll visit Zuzu City... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe some day, I'll visit Zuzu City...

Entries.DialogueText: But I'm not even close to being ready, yet. This world is already so strange to me, and I'm very comfortable here right now! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I'm not even close to being ready, yet. This world is already so strange to me, and I'm very comfortable here right now!

Entries.DialogueText: The parrots want me to thank you for all the golden walnuts you've found. They're really enjoying them. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The parrots want me to thank you for all the golden walnuts you've found. They're really enjoying them.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? Um... I'm a little embarrassed to ask... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? Um... I'm a little embarrassed to ask...

Entries.DialogueText: But... do you think Jas would ever like a guy like me? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... do you think Jas would ever like a guy like me?

Entries.DialogueText: Or am I too weird? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or am I too weird?

Entries.DialogueText: Hahaha... who cares. I'll figure it out some day. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hahaha... who cares. I'll figure it out some day.
